posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jay
The following are available for sale or trade (preferred). The Series 2 and 3 cards are $30 each. The Series 5 cards $35 each. The Series 4 cards are $70 each and the Series 7 and 8 cards are $250 each. I will trade any Series 7 or 8 card for an Old Judge card with a nice photo (your choice). I don't care what the back looks like as long as it is original and the card isn't rebacked or trimmed. Otherwise, whatever player you want to trade is fine with me.

Series 2: Hoffman

Series 3:

Series4:Conolly,Donnell,Headly,Young

Series 5: 

Series 7: Armstrong,Beatty,Cooney,Cooper,Dussault,Fulton,Gastmeyer(bat),Gastmeyer(catch),Gunderson,Ham,Hart,Irving,Kaiser,Kelly,Luyster,McCormac,McGeeham,Munson,Newman,Prim,Reeves,Schumaker,Sherrill,Simmons,Stoehr,Webb,Whelan,Wright

Series 8: Bayless,Berger,Hess,Lindsay,McCreery,McTigue,Newton,Rogers,Schopp,Seitz,Smith(Montgomery),Sweeney

Most cards are in nice shape but there are a few turds in the punch bowl. Lower grade cards will be priced appropriately. 
Please email me at oldjudge@gmail.com


Thanks--Jay
